title: Video doesn't show Biden wandering off in Amazon | Fact check
shortDescription: The full footage of Biden's remarks shows him entering and exiting via the same path. Several other people followed the same route while leaving.

title: Trump warns of 'hell to pay' if Hamas does not release all hostages
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump pledged to exact vengeance unless Hamas militants release every Israeli hostage before his January inauguration.

title: Bannon, Kushner, Manafort: Trump's major pardons from his first term
shortDescription: During his first term in office, Trump granted 144 pardons, which included distant family members, some of his closest allies and others.

title: Will Supreme Court give Trump a chance to `save flavored vapes'?
shortDescription: Food and Drug Administration has rejected more than a million vaping products flavored to taste like fruit, candy or desserts.

title: 'Of course': Jill Biden says she supports presidential pardon of Hunter
shortDescription: Jill Biden told reporters she 'of course' supports President Joe Biden's decision to pardon Hunter Biden, who has been convicted of felonies.

title: Trump didn't order woman's arrest in JFK assassination | Fact check
shortDescription: The social media user who first shared it identified it as a fabrication in a later post.

title: Hunter Biden's pardon is 'very unusual,' experts say
shortDescription: Legal experts said President Joe Biden's pardon of his son Hunter was broad and unusual for not specifying the crimes he was being shielded from.

title: Trump picks Brooke Rollins to be agriculture secretary
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday chose Brooke Rollins, president of the America First Policy Institute, to be Secretary of Agriculture.

title: Trump wants clean slate for Jan. 6 rioters after Hunter Biden pardon
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump didn't criticize the Hunter Biden pardon, but he said defendants in the Jan. 6 Capitol Riot deserved pardons as well.

title: What was Hunter Biden convicted of? What to know after presidential pardon
shortDescription: Hunter Biden has been convicted of federal gun charges and federal tax evasion charges. President Joe Biden pardoned his son alleging an unfair process.

title: Daily Briefing: A pardon for Hunter Biden
shortDescription: The president's change of tone on a pardon for his son. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Joe Biden pardons Hunter Biden
shortDescription: In a reversal from a previous pledge, President Joe Biden announced he pardoned his son, Hunter Biden, from federal felony tax and gun charges.

title: President Biden pardons Hunter Biden despite pledges not to
shortDescription: In a stunning reversal, President Joe Biden announced Sunday that he pardoned his son Hunter Biden, who was convicted of gun and tax crimes.

title: 5 things to know about Kash Patel, Donald Trump's firebrand pick to lead the FBI
shortDescription: Kash Patel has called for sweeping changes at the FBI and long railed against government bureaucrats.

title: What are the BRIC nations? Why did Donald Trump threaten them with tariffs?
shortDescription: Donald Trump continues to threaten tariffs against foreign nations, this time toward a bloc of nine countries if they try to undermine the dollar's global dominance.

title: Donald Trump picks Massad Boulos as Arab, Middle Eastern affairs adviser
shortDescription: Massad Boulos, the father-in-law of Donald Trump's daughter Tiffany Trump, met repeatedly with Arab American and Muslim leaders during the election campaign.

title: What's happening in Syria? What to know about the country's complex civil war
shortDescription: A surprise offensive by rebel forces opposed to Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's regime has led to a new round of fighting in a largely static civil war.

title: Showdown ahead? Donald Trump tests Congress on checks and balances
shortDescription: Some Republican senators say they're ready to fight for their role to advise and consent on President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet picks.

title: Latino voters fired Democrats in 2024. Now they're election 'free agents'
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump won the Rio Grande Valley, a Latino-majority area along the border in south Texas.

title: Trump taps Florida sheriff to head DEA and oversee US fentanyl fight
shortDescription: Hillsborough County Sheriff Chad Chronister will be a key player in Trump's effort to 'secure the Border, stop the flow of Fentanyl,' Trump says

title: Trump vows 100% tariff on BRIC nations if they ditch US dollar support
shortDescription: The president-elect's threat comes just days after he threatened big tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China. Experts warn of higher prices.
